::Zardus::

The shuttle lands, the hatch opening. Zardus steps out and motions for 
the rest of them to follow. In front of them was a Predacon ship, 
almost completely overgrown in vines. Zardus slowly approaches, 
motioning for the others to follow and keeping his gun aimed at the 
ship.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Zardus::
> 
> Zardus nods. "There is."
> 
> Something was tugging at the back of his mind, but he couldn't quite 
remember. That ship had indeed landed there, but a long time ago, in 
the beginnings of the Neo Beast Wars.
> 
> "We'll check it out," he says, manuevering the shuttle to land.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> > :::Wheeljack/Hurricane:::
> > 
> > Wheeljack: Can't say i can recall a ship landing here.
> > Hurricane: I don't think ive heard of anything crashing here.
> > Wheeljack: Why Zardus, IS there something
